resources.string:
How to play the game?
 Fill the horizontal, vertical and 3x3 boxes with the numbers 1-9.
 The numbers can ony be used 1 time in each row/ 3x3 box.
 Tap on the box you want to add a number to, then tap on the number you want to out there.
 You can make the number red by checking the "red" box.
 Delete the number in the box by tapping the box and press delete. 
 Tap "Restart" if you want to start from the beginning.
 When everything is filled out you can check your answer by pressing "Check board".
 
 How to add a new board?
 Tap on the box you want to add a number to, then tap on the number you want to out there.
 Choose the level of the board in the menu.
 Save the board by pressing "Save".
 
 Settings:
 Change language by tapping the three dots at the top right corner and tap settings.
